article: the treasury department 's shake-up after the whitewater hearings continued thursday , as its general counsel , jean e. hanson , resigned and secretary lloyd bentsen immediately picked one of his longtime friends from texas to replace her .
abstract: treasury 's general counsel quits as shake-up continues
